mapper.sql: timeId, ptpModel, clockModel, srcclockModel, srcclockId, srcclocktype, srcclockpri1, srcclockpri2, srcclockLevel, srcclockaccuray, SlaveOnlyModel, inCompensation, inDelay, outCompensation, outDelay, SynCicle, NoteCicle, TimeInfoIt, syncFreq, delayFreq, announceFreq, delayOver, announceOver, domainNumbe, siteId
mapper.insert: insert into timesync (ptpModel, clockModel, srcclockModel, srcclockId, srcclocktype, srcclockpri1, srcclockpri2, srcclockLevel, srcclockaccuray, SlaveOnlyModel, inCompensation, inDelay, outCompensation, outDelay, SynCicle, NoteCicle, TimeInfoIt, syncFreq, delayFreq, announceFreq, delayOver, announceOver, domainNumbe, siteId) values ( #{ptpModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clockModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srcclockModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srcclockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcclocktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srcclockpri1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srcclockpri2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srcclockLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srcclockaccuray,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{SlaveOnlyModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inCompensation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outCompensation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{SynCicle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{NoteCicle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{TimeInfoIt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{syncFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delayFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{announceFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delayOver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{announceOver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{domainNumbe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update timesync set ptpModel=#{ptpModel},clockModel=#{clockModel},srcclockModel=#{srcclockModel},srcclockId=#{srcclockId}, srcclocktype=#{srcclocktype},srcclockpri1=#{srcclockpri1},srcclockpri2=#{srcclockpri2},srcclockLevel=#{srcclockLevel}, srcclockaccuray=#{srcclockaccuray},SlaveOnlyModel=#{SlaveOnlyModel},inCompensation=#{inCompensation},inDelay=#{inDelay}, outCompensation=#{outCompensation},outDelay=#{outDelay},SynCicle=#{SynCicle},NoteCicle=#{NoteCicle}, TimeInfoIt=#{TimeInfoIt},syncFreq=#{syncFreq},delayFreq=#{delayFreq} , announceFreq=#{announceFreq} ,delayOver=#{delayOver},announceOver=#{announceOver},domainNumbe=#{domainNumbe} where siteId=#{siteId}
